thread.title: Staff is very friendly
thread.title_full: Staff is very friendly - Review of Viceroy Central Park New York, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: StacyAndMikeL
title: Staff is very friendly
text: We had a very nice stay at the Viceroy. The staff was always smiling and welcoming. The rooms are small, but cozy. My only complaint is that they ran out of bottled water and we had to call multiple times to get a bucket of ice delivered and additional towels. You should only have to make the request once. The rooftop bar is a fun atmosphere, but crowded and super hot.
